description.english: Build the robot from Brawl Royale. [Mecha Dress Up Game]
description.schinese: 制造在皇家擂台中的机器人。

description.english: Build the robot from Epic Battle Fantasy. [Mecha Dress Up Game]
description.schinese: 制造史诗幻想1中的机器人。

description.english: Build the robot from Epic Battle Fantasy 2. [Mecha Dress Up Game]
description.schinese: 制造史诗幻想2中的机器人。

description.english: Find the legendary bacon creature. [Mecha Dress Up Game]
Why would you put it THERE? [Mecha Dress Up Game]
Got enough guns up there yet? [Mecha Dress Up Game]
Conserve energy and be power smart! [Mecha Dress Up Game]
Aw, oops. Wrong button... [Mecha Dress Up Game]
Cool guys don't look at explosions. [Mecha Dress Up Game]
Equip an unconventional weapon. [Mecha Dress Up Game]
description.schinese: 装备一把不寻常的武器。

description.english: Silly cat, get off my lawn! [Brawl Royale]
Go back to your cave, beast. [Brawl Royale]
That's not even a real sword. [Brawl Royale]
Farukon Paaaaanssh! [Brawl Royale]
Not enough wololo. [Brawl Royale]
You call that a gun? This is a gun... [Brawl Royale]
description.schinese: 你管那玩意叫枪？这个才是……

description.english: Fatal security flaw discovered. [Brawl Royale]
Send her back to the kitchen. [Brawl Royale]
Master the guitar. [Brawl Royale]
Save the universe from evil. [Brawl Royale]
Brutally kill your best friend. [Brawl Royale]
description.schinese: 残忍地杀死你最好的朋友。

description.english: Get killed by each enemy in one sitting. [Brawl Royale]
description.schinese: 一次游戏中被每位对手击杀。

description.english: Get a reaction time of 6 frames or less. [Brawl Royale]
description.schinese: 打出一次6帧或以内的反应时间。

description.english: Explode a kitten's head for no reason. [The Kitten Game]
description.schinese: 无缘无故炸掉一只小猫的头。

description.english: Kill an innocent creature and lose points. [The Kitten Game]
description.schinese: 杀死一只无辜的生物并因此扣分。

description.english: Dunk the same cat underwater 5 times. [The Kitten Game]
description.schinese: 把同一只猫泡在水里5次。

description.english: Watch 50 cats burn themselves to death. [The Kitten Game]
Break 500 bricks in one sitting. [The Kitten Game]
Kill 5 fish in one level. [The Kitten Game]
Kill a ghost dead. [The Kitten Game]

displayName.schinese: 别 吃 那 罐 子

description.english: Slap a beer out of a cat's mouth. [The Kitten Game]
description.schinese: 在猫猫嘴里拍出啤酒罐。

description.english: Pop 4 balloons and also beat the level. [The Kitten Game]
description.schinese: 打破4个气球，并通过这一关。

description.english: Beat every level in the game. [The Kitten Game]
Get a gold trophy in every level. [The Kitten Game]
Browse through the concept art gallery. [The Kitten Game]
Slay the giant slime. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
Slay the tentacle beast. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
Slay the mechanical sentinel. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
Slay the bootleg Pok*mon. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
Slay the giant killer robot. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
Slay your undead God. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
View the gallery. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
View the credits. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
Summon calamity upon this earth. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
Get a Game Over. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
Get hit for 10,000+ damage. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
Take lots of damage. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
Buy lots of bombs. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
Try out every sword in one game. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
description.schinese: 一局游戏切换过所有的剑。

description.english: Keep clicking those boobs. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
Beat the game on Normal difficulty or higher. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
description.schinese: 在普通难度或以上通关游戏。

description.english: Beat the game on Hard difficulty or higher. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
description.schinese: 在困难难度或以上通关游戏。

description.english: Beat the game on Epic difficulty. [Epic Battle Fantasy]
Reach an experience level of 30. [Adventure Story]
Max out your HP and MP. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 生命和魔法上限最大化。

description.english: Buy the weakest version of every spell. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 购买每个技能的最弱版本。

description.english: Collect every coin in every level. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 集齐每一关卡里的金币。

description.english: Open every treasure chest in every level. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 打开每一关卡里的宝箱。

description.english: Beat level 3 in under 40 seconds. [Adventure Story]
Beat Level 7 in under 50 seconds. [Adventure Story]
Beat Level 13 in under 60 seconds. [Adventure Story]
Beat Level 19 in under 70 seconds. [Adventure Story]
Defeat any boss with their own projectiles. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 让任意boss的射弹打败它自己。

description.english: Defeat any boss without getting hit. [Adventure Story]
Defeat 1000 foes in total. [Adventure Story]
Drop an enemy into some spikes, and watch it suffer. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 把一个敌人推向针刺，并看着它受苦。

description.english: Hit an enemy with a dangling icicle. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 让悬挂的冰柱砸中敌人。

description.english: Collapse a wooden platform by walking over it. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 走过木平台并引发坍塌。

description.english: Collapse a cloud by standing on it. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 站在一朵云上并使它消散。

description.english: Fall into a pit of spikes and regret it. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 掉进针刺中，你会为这个决定感到后悔。

description.english: Bounce off a mushroom and into the air. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 从一个蘑菇上弹到空中。

description.english: Stand on lava for too long and get hurt. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 站在岩浆上过久而受伤。

description.english: Stand on ice and slide around. [Adventure Story]
Perform a massive aerial combo by bouncing off enemies. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 在怪物们的头顶连续不断地空中弹跳。

description.english: Keep an enemy up in the air by attacking it. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 一直砍一只怪物，让它在空中下不来。

description.english: Discover the standard 3-hit melee combo. [Adventure Story]
Lose your ability to cast spells, you don't need them. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 失去施放魔法的能力，反正你不需要它们。

description.english: Cast a spell for the first time. [Adventure Story]
Cast a level 3 spell. [Adventure Story]
Complete level 20, rescue the princess and finish the game. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 通过第20关，解救公主并通关游戏。

description.english: Check out the credits page and maybe visit some links. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 看看制作名单，顺带可以访问些链接。

description.english: Complete the Foe Rush on hard, epic or extreme difficulty. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 在困难、史诗或极限难度下完成怪物车轮战。

description.english: Complete the Boss Rush on hard, epic or extreme difficulty. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 在困难、史诗或极限难度下完成boss车轮战。

description.english: Complete the Ultra Boss Rush on hard, epic or extreme difficulty. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 在困难、史诗或极限难度下完成加强boss车轮战。

description.english: Deflect a speeding bullet with your indestructible steel katana. [Adventure Story]
description.schinese: 用你那坚不可摧的武士刀弹开一颗高速飞行的子弹。

description.english: Jump sky high as if you're using cheat codes. [Adventure Story]
Destroy the cats' mobile fortress. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 摧毁小猫们的移动堡垒。

description.english: Smash up an elite sentry. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 粉碎那台精英哨兵机甲。

description.english: Master the elements. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
Eat worms for breakfast. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 把蠕虫炖了当晚餐吃掉。

description.english: Keep killing it until it dies. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 一直打，直到它彻底死去。

description.english: Defeat the final boss and save the world. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
Do more than 99999 damage with one hit. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 造成高于单次99999点的极限伤害。

description.english: Try out all 11 swords in one game. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 一局游戏内切换过全部11把剑。

description.english: Complete the bestiary by scanning all foes. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 扫描全部敌人集齐全部图鉴。

description.english: Matt survives with 1HP left. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 首次遭遇离子炮的轨道打击。

description.english: Get killed by a summon. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 马特以仅剩1HP的状态存活。

description.english: Get 5,000 points in part one. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 被召唤攻击的反伤击杀。

description.english: Get 6,000 points in part two. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 在小游戏第一关获得5000点数。

description.english: Get 10,000 points in survival. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 在小游戏第二关获得6000点数。

description.english: Bring NoLegs to the battlefield. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 在小游戏生存模式获得10000分。

description.english: Washed away by waves of fire. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
Beat the game on Normal difficulty or higher. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 浸没于成片的火海之中。

description.english: Beat the game on Hard difficulty or higher. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 在普通难度或以上通关游戏。

description.english: Beat the game on Epic difficulty. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 在困难难度或以上通关游戏。

description.english: The Ion Cannon fires for the first time. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
Get 10 of the in-game medals. [Cat Cafe]
Get 18 of the in-game medals. [Cat Cafe]
Get 24 of the in-game medals. [Cat Cafe]
Get 30 of the in-game medals. [Cat Cafe]
Get 36 of the in-game medals. [Cat Cafe]
Get A or S ranks in 5 or more levels. [Bullet Heaven]
Get A or S ranks in 10 or more levels. [Bullet Heaven]
Get A or S ranks in 15 or more levels. [Bullet Heaven]
Get A or S ranks in 20 or more levels. [Bullet Heaven]
Get A or S ranks in all 25 levels. [Bullet Heaven]
Reach wave 33 in Survival without killing anything, including bomb foes. [Bullet Heaven]
description.schinese: 不杀任何敌人在无尽模式达到33波，自爆类敌人也不行。

description.english: Kill 1,000 foes in a single game of Survival. [Bullet Heaven]
description.schinese: 一次无尽游戏内击败1000名敌人。

description.english: Beat any level between 16 and 20 without taking any damage. [Bullet Heaven]
description.schinese: 无伤通过第16-20关的任意一关。

description.english: Kill 300 enemies in total. [Bullet Heaven]
Kill 1,000 enemies in total. [Bullet Heaven]
Kill 3,000 enemies in total. [Bullet Heaven]
Kill 10,000 enemies in total. [Bullet Heaven]
Fully upgrade any stat. [Bullet Heaven]
Fully upgrade all stats. [Bullet Heaven]
Collect 100 power ups in total. [Bullet Heaven]
Get hit 100 times in total. [Bullet Heaven]
Play 5 levels as NoLegs. [Bullet Heaven]
Play 5 levels as Matt. [Bullet Heaven]
Play 5 levels as Natalie. [Bullet Heaven]
Play 5 levels as Lance. [Bullet Heaven]
Play 5 levels as Anna. [Bullet Heaven]
Get a score of 500,000 in any level except survival. [Bullet Heaven]
description.schinese: 在除无尽模式外的任意关卡得到500,000分。

description.english: Get a score of 1,000,000 in any level except survival. [Bullet Heaven]
description.schinese: 在除无尽模式外的任意关卡得到1,000,000分

description.english: Finish any level except Survival with over 3,000 coins. [Bullet Heaven]
description.schinese: 在除无尽模式外的任意关卡收集3000金币。

description.english: Use a bomb for the first time. [Bullet Heaven]
Kill 25 enemies instantly, with Matt's bomb. [Bullet Heaven]
description.schinese: 用马特的炸弹秒杀25个敌人。

description.english: Take damage with over 666 enemy bullets on screen. [Bullet Heaven]
description.schinese: 在屏幕内有至少666颗弹幕的情况下受击。

description.english: Reflect over 100 bullets with a single shield. [Bullet Heaven]
description.schinese: 一次护盾内反弹100颗弹幕。

description.english: Complete all bonus levels. [Bullet Heaven]
Defeat the final boss and complete the standard set of 20 levels. [Bullet Heaven]
description.schinese: 打败最终boss，完成主线的20关。

description.english: Get killed with no enemies on screen. [Bullet Heaven]
description.schinese: 在屏幕内没有敌人的情况下被击败。

description.english: Beat the first 20 levels without upgrading your health. [Bullet Heaven]
description.schinese: 不升级血量上限，打通前20关。

description.english: Play 5 levels as Green Bush. [Bullet Heaven]
Play 5 levels as Slime Bunny. [Bullet Heaven]
Play 5 levels as Flybot. [Bullet Heaven]
Play 5 levels as Dry NoLegs. [Bullet Heaven]
Play every main game at least once. [Epic Battle Fantasy Collection]
description.schinese: 每个主游戏至少玩了一次。

description.english: Play every prototype at least once. [Epic Battle Fantasy Collection]
description.schinese: 每个游戏原型至少玩了一次。

description.english: Read the history of every game. [Epic Battle Fantasy Collection]
description.schinese: 阅读每部游戏的创作历程。

description.english: Use a fully-upgraded Cleaver Limit Break. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 使出升到顶级的屠魂斩极限技。

description.english: Do over 35,000 damage with a staff bonk. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 使用魔杖敲打造成超过3.5万点伤害。

description.english: Slam foes with an earth-shaking skill. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 用技能在打击敌人时触发地震效果。

description.english: Defeat any boss in one turn. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
A poisonous plague spreads among foes. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 将带毒瘟疫散布在敌群中。

description.english: Launch a powerful new missile weapon. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
Steal a rare item from an enemy. [Epic Battle Fantasy 2]
description.schinese: 从敌人身上偷取到一件稀有道具。
